text: avareyellam nam orumiccukuttukayum, ennitt bahudaivavisvasikaleat ninnalum ninnal pankalikalayi certtavarum avitettanne nilkku. enn parayukayum ceyyunna divasam (srad'dheyamatre.) anantaram nam avare tam'mil verpetuttum. avar pankalikalayi certtavar parayum: ninnal nannaleyalla aradhiccirunnatâ€Œ
